Title: Frenzy
Actors: Jon Finch, Barry Foster, Barbara Leigh-Hunt, Anna Massey
Plot: London is terrorised by a vicious sex killer known as the neck tie murderer. Following the brutal slaying of his ex-wife, down-on-his-luck Richard Blaney is suspected by the police of being the killer. He goes on the run, determined to prove his innocence.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
